title: Kris Jenner Officiates Friend's Wedding
text:
Kris Jenner Officiates Friend's Wedding Posted just a moment ago 
Timothy White/E! (LOS ANGELES) -- Kris Jenner, the Kardashian family "momager," also handles weddings. 
The 59-year-old reality star officiated the wedding of her longtime friend Faye Resnick over the weekend, and Kris hosted the ceremony at her Calabasas, California home, according to People magazine. 
Kris' daughter Khloé also attended the nuptials, along with Real Housewives of Beverly Hills star Kyle Richards and her family, and real estate bigwig Rick Hilton. 
Hilton posted a picture on Instagram of Resnick, 58, and her fiancé, Everett Jack Jr., at the altar with Jenner standing between them. 
Richards also shared some shots of the wedding, including a video of her daughter Portia dancing with Khloé captioned, "I wanna dance with somebody! @khloekardashian gives good dancing lessons."
